title: Looking for serious/semi-serious ranked team to get gold+
body:
So I've been interested in played with a ranked 5vs team that's actually interested in climbing. 
I'm currently Gold 3, can play {{champion:222}}  adc, {{champion:34}}  mid, {{champion:254}}  jungle and {{champion:80}}  top at a consistent level. With ADC being my preference. 
While not limited to those champs they are my 'comfort' picks for those roles and those roles are in order of preference.
I am free every night except 8-10 Wed/Sun where the league community I'm a part of gets together to play some games.

Dezzter

replies.body:
Hey mate,

I'm in the same boat, i'm looking for a team that actually wants to climb, not just going for ward skins.

I main support and have been for about 3 years and basically play everything.
I'm also a gold III solo queue and was involved in 3 gold ranked teams last season.
I can also off jungle if need be.

Feel free to keep me in mind if a team you join is interested in an active support wanting to climb in 5's also.

cheers,
I'm down I main all  mid laners and adcs g5
feel free to join my discord channel and ask anyone on it https://discord.gg/XvwfvUh
